commit 469c5483cbb1c8278b57ec366238d458296a190e
Author: Phil <pnomolos@gmail.com>
Date:   Fri Jan 5 11:11:50 2018 -0800

    SendModal - Close once 'Send' is clicked.
    
    Per github discussion, due to the async nature of these modals it's much
    simpler to just close to Send dialog and have a user re-open the Send
    box if they have an error.
    
    Included basic check to disable Send button from activating if the from
    and to accounts are the same.

commit 58ad536b16e3adc8132bbe654770eef7a13e18a6
Author: Matt Beckman <matt@beckman.co>
Date:   Mon Nov 13 01:29:10 2017 -0800

    Bug fix #689 - Sorting portfolio assets (#730)
    
    * Fix for sorting issue in My Portfolio.
    
    It appears sortFunctions declared outside the component class was unable to access state after the component was rebound. Simplest solution that worked was moving the sort functions inside the class, similar to how Blockchain/Asset.jsx does it.
    
    * no message

commit ae84a3c409867ef0a83401587df02da34b9eb963
Author: tianyekuo <tianyekuo@hotmail.com>
Date:   Tue Oct 10 15:06:44 2017 +0800

    fix: parseInt for minimum_feeds when create asset (#539)
    
    When update minimum_feeds, the type will change from integer to string cause create asset fail.
    
    Repo:
    1. create asset
    2. select "SmartCoin" option
    3. update "MININUM NUMBER OF FEEDs" from default 7 to 3
    4. finish the process to do create asset
    
    Issue:
    Error shows minimum_feeds should be integer

    * use higher order modal component to improve code sharing and allow for global modal keyboard control
    
    * Small tweaks to base modal

Author: svk31 <sigvekvalsvik@gmail.com>
Date:   Wed May 18 20:03:41 2016 +0200

    Fallback to old, incorrect memo decode method if new method fails #849

commit 75d41295b86006c9f31069f16323fd3d683ecb5a
Merge: f93064169 22c2d61c7
Author: Sigve Kvalsvik <bitsharesblocks@gmail.com>
Date:   Wed May 18 20:00:08 2016 +0200

    Merge pull request #849 from emfrias/fix_incompatible_memo_encryption
    
    Fixes a bug that caused the CLI wallet to be unable to decrypt memos

commit 22c2d61c72cf5f84f65f8ceb457e9fe01d163ce5
Author: Eric Frias <efrias@syncad.com>
Date:   Wed May 18 09:31:06 2016 -0400

    Fixes a bug that caused the CLI wallet to be unable to decrypt memos
    in some transactions sent by the web wallet, and vice versa.
    The shared secret used in to encrypt the memos is derived by computing
    a 256-bit quantity from the public and private keys.  When the high-
    order byte of this quantity is zero, this implementation was omitting
    the high-order byte, producing a 248-bit number instead.  When passed
    through the hash function to create the symmetric key, this generated
    a different key from the C++ implementation which always generates
    256-bits.
    This fix will restore compatibility with the CLI wallet, but will
    prevent the web wallet from decoding any incompatible memos that were
    have already been generated.

commit f9306416969d37015284494b37df6b492a5f2f9e
Author: svk31 <sigvekvalsvik@gmail.com>
Date:   Wed May 18 16:18:14 2016 +0200

    Fix Chatbox scrolling to bottom on new messages

commit f7885df578da72ebcbe29ffea860dae9ca7c5796
Author: Eric Frias <efrias@syncad.com>
Date:   Mon May 16 15:30:07 2016 -0400

    Fix the BlockTrades gateway, which was not validating withdrawal addresses
    correctly

commit 1e71d432e5bd6c27ff6f684b4f3ae353926446e7
Author: svk31 <sigvekvalsvik@gmail.com>
Date:   Sat May 14 09:42:54 2016 +0200

    Update version to 2.0.160514

commit 09e201891bae548a2514f5339b1f6824cd5ec93b
Author: Sigve Kvalsvik <bitsharesblocks@gmail.com>

commit c5392d3b55fe09355fc6337fe49aa2b4ffe27b3b
Author: rnglab <nahuepz@gmail.com>
Date:   Wed Sep 30 21:54:50 2015 -0300

    Create locale-es.js
    
    Spanish translation created on Transifex https://www.transifex.com/bitshares/graphene-ui
    
    Graphene-ui translation project on transifex polls locale-en.js from raw github code once a day, updates the source translation file if there's any change and notifies translators. This should help keeping locale files up to date with no need to constantly check for diffs between translation files and locale-en.js
